verses.name: Revelation 9:17
verses.text: And thus I saw the horses in the vision, and them that sat on them, having breastplates of fire, and of jacinth, and brimstone: and the heads of the horses were as the heads of lions; and out of their mouths issued fire and smoke and brimstone.

verses.name: Revelation 9:18
verses.text: By these three was the third part of men killed, by the fire, and by the smoke, and by the brimstone, which issued out of their mouths.
